mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user set iaddr = #{iaddr}, rest_addr = #{restAddr}, uid = #{uid}, upw = #{upw}, nick = #{nick}, stored_pic = #{pic}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, x = #{x}, y = #{y}
mapper.select: SELECT u.iuser, a.auth, u.upw, u.uid FROM t_user u JOIN t_auth a ON a.iauth = u.iauth WHERE u.uid = #{uid}

SELECT P.iproduct,U.iuser FROM t_user U LEFT JOIN t_product P ON P.istatus IN (-1, -2) JOIN t_product_payment PP ON P.iproduct = PP.iproduct JOIN t_payment PA ON PP.ipayment = PA.ipayment AND PA.istatus IN (1, -1, -2, -3) WHERE U.iuser = #{iuser}
SELECT u.y, u.x,CONCAT_WS(a.eupmyun,u.rest_addr) as addr, u.nick, u.stored_pic as storedPic, u.phone, u.email, u.raiting FROM t_user u JOIN t_eupmyun a ON a.ieupmyun= u.iaddr WHERE u.iuser = #{iuser}
